# Output generated by @ua_chatgpt_bot

Ваше питання: what business to launch on instagram in ukraine in 2023.

Відповідь: One possible business to launch on Instagram in Ukraine in 2023 could be an eco-friendly home goods shop. With an increasing focus on sustainability around the world, there is likely to be plenty of consumer demand for products made with sustainable materials. The business would be able to market itself and advertise its products on Instagram, allowing it to reach a wide and targeted audience in Ukraine. The company could also source environmentally-friendly materials locally, giving it a competitive edge against competitors.
